General.Name: Chongqing Taiji Industry Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Chongqing Taiji Industry(Group) Co.,Ltd produces and sells Chinese patent medicines, western medicines, Chinese herbal medicines, and other products in China. It offers its products in various areas, such as digestive system and metabolism, respiratory system, cardiovascular and cerebrovascular, systemic anti-infective drugs, endocrine system drugs, nervous system drugs, general health products, etc. The company was incorporated in 1979 and is headquartered in Chongqing, China.

4.Name: Ms. Qian  Jiang
4.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
